value:
select src.Question_cd,
src.Question_Description,
actv_rec_ind,
LKP_MAXSID.MAX_SID from(
select Question_cd,
Question_Description,
actv_rec_ind,
1 dummy from(
 select cast(trim(Question_cd) as varchar(10)) Question_cd,
cast(trim(Question_Description) as varchar(10000)) Question_Description,
cast('Y' as char(1)) as actv_rec_ind,
row_number()over(partition by Question_cd,Question_Description order by Question_cd) rno  FROM cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_questions)
where rno=1 ) src
left outer join
(select 1 as dummy, max(dim_nps_questions_key) as MAX_SID from cdp_dwh.dim_nps_questions_t) LKP_MAXSID
on src.dummy = LKP_MAXSID.dummy
SELECT distinct dim_nps_questions_key,trim(Question_cd) Question_cd,trim(Question_Description) Question_Description FROM cdp_dwh.dim_nps_questions_t

name: Post-sql
